section.title: Removing a Host
section.para: Remove a host from your virtualized environment.

step.para: In the Administration Portal, click the Hosts resource tab and select the host in the results list.
Place the host into maintenance mode.
Click Remove to open the Remove Host(s) confirmation window.
Select the Force Remove check box if the host is part of a Red Hat Gluster Storage cluster and has volume bricks on it, or if the host is non-responsive.

section.para: Your host has been removed from the environment and is no longer visible in the Hosts tab.
